author: wouf
body:
#### PR description:

This is bugfix for https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36316 . It fixes some bugs from [here](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/jenkins-artifacts/pull-request-integration/PR-cae5ac/22136/llvm-analysis/), including memory leak issues. Also in this PR, ED modules from the test/ folder were replaced.

#### PR validation:

Hydjet2 - wf 160
Hydjet - wf 150
Pyquen - wf 300
title: memory leak fixes for Hydjets
